Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: By hemolytic assay , she exhibited 1 - 2 % of the normal serum C5 level and normal concentrations of other complement components .

Let's think step by step.

The "Disease" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Hemolytic assay (a laboratory test used to measure the activity of the complement system)
2. Low serum C5 level (a abnormality in the complement system)
3. Normal concentrations of other complement components (a contrasting normality in the complement system)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Sure, here are the revised "Disease" entities in the paragraph:

1. Low serum C5 level (a abnormality in the complement system)

The mention of "normal concentrations of other complement components" is not a disease entity, as it refers to a normal aspect of the complement system. Therefore, the only disease entity in the paragraph is the low serum C5 level.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid disease entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| Low serum C5 level |
